name: Lonely Trip
description:
STORYIn the deep universe, there’s a special planet. On this planet, lives a mysterious little creature who has two green leaves on its head and the great power to change the gravity around it. One day, a rift appears in the sky, something fallen from the rift with the dazzling light shining like a meteor.
Seeing this, the little one decides to start the journey and find out what happened.

FEATURESRotate the worlds to solve puzzles and avoid dangers, lead the little monster to the destination safely.
CHALLENGING LEVELSDark forest, waste lands and freezing plains. Various kinds of levels and items to make your journey fulfilled with challenge.


TO PLAYERSDear player, we really appreciate that you could buy and play lonely Trip. It is our honor!
From design to program to art, Lonely Trip is completely finished by one person whose dream is to develop indie games from her very young age, and this is her first published game.

There might be some bugs or unpolished stuff, and we are really sorry for that. We promise that we will update and polish this product continuously to make sure you never regret for buying this game. Thank you for your understanding and support.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us via email.
